name: speedcontrol-util
description: Node.js package with utilities to help you code NodeCG bundles that interface with the nodecg-speedcontrol bundle.
author: zoton2

scripts.clean: trash node_modules/.cache && trash browser && trash server && trash shared && trash index.d.ts && trash index.js && trash index.js.map
scripts.copy-schemas: trash schemas && shx cp -r node_modules/nodecg-speedcontrol/schemas schemas
scripts.copy-types: trash types && shx cp -r node_modules/nodecg-speedcontrol/types types && cd types && shx rm .eslintrc.js vue-shim.d.ts VueDraggable.d.ts vuetify-shim.d.ts ParseDuration.d.ts
